item.title: Make a weapon attack 5 times with 1 spec
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

how do u make a weapon like the Dragon claws attack 5 times drgaons claws was an example
i made a weapon called wereclaws and i want them to spec 5 times so i tried doing this:

specialDamage = 0;
specialDamage2 = 0;
specialDamage3 = 0;
specialDamage4 = 0;
specialDamage5 = 0;

but alas it dident work it still attacked 2 times… how do i get it to attack 5 times?
